statements: DELETE FROM climate_disasters WHERE location = 'California' AND severity > 7;
DELETE FROM hurricanes WHERE id = 123 AND location = 'Florida'
DELETE FROM wildfires WHERE area_affected > 1000 AND date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM floods WHERE severity = 'low' AND damage_cost > 10000;
DELETE FROM hurricanes WHERE year < 2000 AND severity = 'high';
DELETE FROM wildfires WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND acreage > 500.00;
DELETE FROM wildfires WHERE region = 'West Coast' AND acres_burned > 5000;
DELETE FROM wildfires WHERE containment_status = 'Not Contained';
